title: Looking for people to join a ranked team. Gold+
body:
I'm looking for people to frequently play with in a ranked team. That means you have to be eligible to play every 4 out of 7 days at least.
If you're gold+ and looking to play for a team then you are eligible to answer the following questions. 
What role do you main.
What champions do you play on that role.
Do you have skype.
Can you play at least 4 out of 7 nights every week.
What league are you.
If you are looking to join our team then reply back answering these questions and putting your league of legends name with it.
Also please add me on League of Legends if you are interested my name is Et3rnal.

replies.body:
Hi mate! My name in game is Dogma

Prefer suppor.

My champ prefer: Thresh - Leona - Nami - Morgana.

Yes I have skype.

I have a work but yes I can play 4 out of 7 nights every week.

I'm Gold III now.
Hi, I main mid. Best champs are morgana, akali, ahri. I have skype. Can paly often and am in Gold 5 atm. MovedNutria1 is league name.

diamond /Challenger Jungler/Top
I am experienced in shot calling!
add me plez
il play tonight
Were currently looking for a top, mid and support mains!
Main sup add if still needed

IGN: CandySlay3r

What role do you main: Support
What champions do you play on that role: my mains are nami and morgana, but I also play blitz, learning braum and thresh, however I consider myself better at ranged champions.
Do you have skype: yes
Can you play at least 4 out of 7 nights every week: yes
What league are you: Gold 3
